snippet.title: The Looter - Official Trailer | Realms Deep 2023
snippet.description: Tour creepy locations, see terrifying enemies, and explore a post-apocalyptic world in The Looter, a 2D action-adventure game coming to PC. The Looter is set in the post-apocalyptic land of Tortura, a giant forest that has slowly devoured the traces of civilization long gone. As the Looter, you set out on a mission that will take you through the most perilous corners of this dark and dangerous world.
